attributes.action: An end to paying Child Benefits for families with more than 2 children
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to take action to curtail rampant benefit spending on Child Benefit.  Couples wishing to have more than 2 children should no longer expect the state to pay for those additional children.  If without additional benefits a couple could not afford to give birth to a 3+ child, then they should not be encouraged to live beyond their means at the taxpayers expense.
